EducInstitutionOffering.name: EducInstitutionOffering
EducInstitutionOffering.description: Represents a junction between an institution's account and other objects, such as program, learning program, and academic term.

AcademicTermId.description: The academic term related to the institution offering.

ApplicationTimelineId.description: The application timeline related to the institution offering.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The ISO code for the currency related to the educational institution offering.

EducInstitutionAccountId.description: The institution's account related to the institution offering.

EndDate.description: The end date of the institution offering.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the institution offering is active (true) or not (false).

IsPubliclySearchable.description: Indicates whether the institution offering is publicly searchable (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

LearningProgramId.description: The learning program related to the institution offering.

Name.description: The name of the educational institution offering.

ProgramId.description: The program related to the institution offering.

ProgramTermApplnTimelineId.description: The program term application timeline related to the institution offering.

StartDate.description: The start date of the institution offering.
